[[Image:Chris Newman.png|thumb|250px|Chris Newman during filming for Season 5.]]
'''Christopher Newman''' is the Line Producer for the main ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' filming locations in Northern Ireland.

He also had a cameo appearance as [[HosterÂ Tully|Hoster&nbsp;Tully]] in the Season 3 episode "[[Walk of Punishment]]".

He continued to work as a line producer on ''Game of Thrones'' through [[Season 5]].
